text: Konstantin Lukich Gilchevsky (March 5, 1857 – after 1927) was an Imperial Russian brigade, division and corps commander. He fought in the war against the Ottoman Empire. == External links == * Русская армия в Великой войне: Картотека проекта: Гильчевский Константин Лукич * «Не хотел командовать грабителями и убивать грабителей» Category:1857 births Category:20th-century deaths Category:Russian military personnel of the Russo-Turkish War (1877–1878) Category:Russian military personnel of World War I
title: Konstantin Gilchevsky
